articles.title: In most anticipated series at Fenway in years, Red Sox faceplant against Yankees in opener
articles.description:
"You have to cash in. It really doesn't matter who you're playing."

The post In most anticipated series at Fenway in years, Red Sox faceplant against Yankees in opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox lost to Yankees in opener at Fenway on September 12, 2025.
Team struggled with no hits and multiple errors during the game.
Local fans disappointed as expectations were high for this anticipated series.

articles.title: Aaron Judge passes DiMaggio, Luis Gil pitches 6 no-hit innings as Yankees beat Red Sox 4-1
articles.description:
Boston's loss helped New York expand its edge in the race for home-field advantage in the American League playoffs.

The post Aaron Judge passes DiMaggio, Luis Gil pitches 6 no-hit innings as Yankees beat Red Sox 4-1 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Yankees defeated Red Sox 4-1 on September 12, 2025.
Aaron Judge surpassed Joe DiMaggio for career home runs.
Red Sox's loss affects their playoff positioning in the American League.
